00011 CCameraSettings::CCameraSettings(Uint8 dlg_theme):
00012 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00013 m_CameraBounds(g_pVideoDriver->getCameraBounds())
00014 {
00015  std::string buf;
00016  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(18, 13, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, m_dlg_theme);
00017 
00018  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 1, " Adjust Bounds: ");
00019  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 2, " Left (50-270): ");
00020  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, " "+itoa(m_CameraBounds.left));
00021  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 4, " Right (50-270):");
00022  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, " "+itoa(m_CameraBounds.right));
00023  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 6, " Up (50-150):   ");
00024  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 7, " "+itoa(m_CameraBounds.up));
00025  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 8, " Down (50-150): ");
00026  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 9, " "+itoa(m_CameraBounds.down));
00027  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 10, " Speed (1-50):  ");
00028  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 11, " "+itoa(m_CameraBounds.speed));
00029 
00030  mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_COUNTER);
00031 }
00032 
00033 void CCameraSettings::processSpecific()
00034 {
00035  if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 2)
00036  {
00037   mp_Dialog->m_min = 50;
00038   mp_Dialog->m_max = 270;
00039   mp_Dialog->m_length = 3;
00040  }
00041  else if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 4)
00042  {
00043   mp_Dialog->m_min = 50;
00044   mp_Dialog->m_max = 270;
00045   mp_Dialog->m_length = 3;
00046  }
00047  else if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 6)
00048  {
00049   mp_Dialog->m_min = 50;
00050   mp_Dialog->m_max = 150;
00051   mp_Dialog->m_length = 3;
00052  }
00053  else if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 8)
00054  {
00055   mp_Dialog->m_min = 50;
00056   mp_Dialog->m_max = 150;
00057   mp_Dialog->m_length = 3;
00058  }
00059  else if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 10)
00060  {
00061   mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00062   mp_Dialog->m_max = 50;
00063   mp_Dialog->m_length = 2;
00064  }
00065 
00066  m_CameraBounds.left = atoi(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(2)->m_Option->m_text);
00067  m_CameraBounds.right = atoi(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_text);
00068  m_CameraBounds.up = atoi(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(6)->m_Option->m_text);
00069  m_CameraBounds.down = atoi(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(8)->m_Option->m_text);
00070  m_CameraBounds.speed = atoi(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(10)->m_Option->m_text);
00071 
00072  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00073  {
00074   if(mp_Dialog->getInputMode(INPUT_MODE_COUNTER))
00075   {
00076    mp_Dialog->m_name = "";
00077    mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_INTEGER);
00078    m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00079   }
00080   else if (mp_Dialog->getInputMode(INPUT_MODE_INTEGER))
00081   {
00082    if(mp_Dialog->m_name == "")
00083    {
00084     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, " "+itoa(mp_Dialog->m_int));
00085     mp_Dialog->m_name = itoa(mp_Dialog->m_int);
00086    }
00087    else
00088    {
00089     if(atoi(mp_Dialog->m_name)>mp_Dialog->m_max)
00090      mp_Dialog->m_name = itoa(mp_Dialog->m_max);
00091     else if(atoi(mp_Dialog->m_name)<mp_Dialog->m_min)
00092      mp_Dialog->m_name = itoa(mp_Dialog->m_min);
00093 
00094     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, " "+mp_Dialog->m_name);
00095    }
00096    mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_COUNTER);
00097    m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00098   }
00099  }
00100 }
00101 
00102 CCameraSettings::~CCameraSettings()
00103 {
00104  g_pVideoDriver->saveCameraBounds(m_CameraBounds);
00105 }
